vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Ἅγαρ (Rec. Ἄ-), ἡ, indecl. (in FlJ, Ἀγάρα, -ης, Heb. הָגָר),
Hagar (Gen.16): Gal.4:24,25.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A woman living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.16.1; married to Abraham (H0085);
mother of: Ishmael (H3458)
§ (Proper name), indecl, Hagar (Gen. 16), Gal. 4:24, 25*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
夏甲 这个陰性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "逃離"
亞伯拉罕的妾，以實瑪利的母親
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
夏甲 这个阴性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "逃离"
亚伯拉罕的妾，以实玛利的母亲
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: A-ga « Trốn tránh », người Ai-cập, nô lệ của Sa-rai. // H1904 Stk 16:15; 21
